comments.comment: This vedio is of.  someone sponsered by u.n.p and catholic church. Every bad thing happened.  in srilanka to suffer now started to happen after 1977 u.n.p came to power. Whole hell was poured into srilanka by j.r jayawardana. R.premadasa and. Ranil wickramasinghe. Who continued the war ?  And  who helped l.t.t.e. ? Premadasa, chandrika kumaratunga and ranil.  Who ended war?   Mahinda rajapakse and army soldiers. If prabakaran was alive.  by now many of those insult mahinda rajapakse like The chatty abusive man who is in this vedio or his familys. would have been exploded into pieces. . If it was. In another country where intelligent humane beings live mahinda rajapakse and army would be appreciated. In srilanka people are jeoulous of leaders who saved nation and army heroes. Who saved nations lives . They are called thieves and murderers and  these traitors want them to be imprisoned.  Why call humane beings ugly words like (pretha thattuwa ) without proof.nwhat did opposition steal from this man ? Look at this man and his points. This is mad man Gonawala sunil was u.n.ps man. He was taken oiut by presidents.   From prison after jailed for murders and promoted to be ranil wickramasinghes body guard a secured job and sunil continued to rape young girls and  to  kill people while police looked away . Protected by his boss ranil.At last he was killed by people whom he wronged. But those who support in comments for this loud foul mouthed mad  mans rubbish talk which is senseless. , only  his high  pitch voice makimg peoples ear drums damage  these people. Of u.n.p are   Jeoulous with rajapakse familys.  Unity. Of standing together. . Tightly. Unlike. Chandrika kumarztunga who ruined her only brother anura. politicaly he died untimely.  and r.premadasa who came from poverty but never helped his brothers or sisters. To progress these are traitors for their own flesh and blood. His gamudawa was for only u.n.p surpporters not for others not even his poor brothers or sisters did not get benefit.those  who hate buddhist monks  also surpport pro catholic u.n.p . Monks are the ones who protect sinhalese race. They who opose monks and rajapakses.  want l.t.t.e to be successful through  u.n.p and t.n.a. And buddhism to be wiped out by attacking monksv Having water in their brain. Surely he is payed by ranjan ramanayake like u.n.p traitors  who hate buddhist bhikkus. And  well behaved  society.mpretending to be gentleman but good actor by prefession and chose by duds to act in parliament.  Some people who have commented are like killers of buddhist monks the guardian angels who protect socity and huddha dhamma. . All those who abuse mahinda rajapakse have their tongues wagging like basket women  are standing there without fear because of patriotic army and mahinda rajapakse and buddhist monks who encouraged him to defest l.t.t.e. .  A Wise  fair desent person will condemn this mans talk and those comments.  Of some who. surpport him.  Are.  Very biased unintelligent.  Lot. Srilanka has become hell because of ungreatful gossiping.  Scandalising foul mouthed men like this man in vedio.  How can he prove it is united opposition  got surpport from madush.  ? Madush killed rajapakses provincial council minister hiththatiya and his relative   Is this proof  to say madush killed the men. Of the party he was freindly with . ? No sense in this mans talk. Some of.  The srilankan people. Are  idiots they never have logic. But beleive any loud mouthed man on the road say.  Not nice people to be born with.these srilankans.  Who listen to every tom. Dick and harry going in the road  and agree.
comments.author: ranee ranatunga
